name: A grand spellburned silk robe
data: It decreases the users strength impressively.
It decreases the users constitution impressively.
It increases the users wisdom impossibly much.
It increases the users intelligence impossibly much.
It increases the users charisma impossibly much.
It has mediocre armour class for its type (adequate in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration ILLEGALLY.
It increases the users magical resistance superbly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
